mapper.select: SELECT cta.PLAN_NO ,#{dayGroup:VARCHAR} AS DAY_GRP ,cpm.TRIP_TERM ,(SELECT SUM(cc.AMT) FROM CT_TRIP_ACNT cc WHERE DAY_GRP = #{dayGroup:VARCHAR}) AS DAY_AMT_SUM ,SUM(cta.AMT) AS PLAN_AMT_SUM FROM CT_TRIP_ACNT cta, CT_PLAN_MGMT cpm WHERE cta.PLAN_NO = cpm.PLAN_NO AND cta.PLAN_NO = #{planNo:VARCHAR};

SELECT cta.ACNT_NO ,cta.DAILYPLAN_NO ,cta.POST_NO ,cta.POST_TP_CD ,cta.ACNT_NM ,cta.SORT_SEQ ,cta.AMT FROM CT_TRIP_ACNT cta LEFT JOIN CT_POST_MGMT post ON cta.POST_NO = post.POST_NO WHERE cta.PLAN_NO = #{planNo:VARCHAR} AND cta.DAY_GRP = #{dayGroup:VARCHAR} ORDER BY cta.SORT_SEQ, cta.REG_DTIME;
